abstract_summ: IMPORTANCE: Asymptomatic SARS-CoV-2 infections are potential sources for transmission; characterization of these cases has not been conducted in most low/middle income countries, including Mexico.METHODS A total of 511 confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection cases, including 100 asymptomatic (by the time of the pathogenic tests) and 411 symptomatic individuals were consecutively enrolled from January 25 to February 20, 2020 from hospitals in 21 cities and 47 counties or districts in Sichuan Province.Conclusions: Asymptomatic SARS-CoV-2 infection is common and can be detected by analysis of saliva or NTS.CONCLUSIONS: Asymptomatic SARS-CoV-2 infection is common and can be detected by analysis of saliva or NTS.We found that the asymptomatic patients in Jinan were relatively young and were mainly clustered cases.
title_summ: Profiling pre-symptomatic and asymptomatic cases with confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection in Mexico CityA considerable proportion of individuals with asymptomatic SARS-CoV-2 infection in Tibetan populationThe natural history and transmission potential of asymptomatic SARS-CoV-2 infectionHigh incidence of asymptomatic SARS-CoV-2 infection, Chongqing, ChinaCharacteristics of asymptomatic patients with SARS-CoV-2 infection in Jinan, ChinaThe natural history and transmission potential of asymptomatic SARS-CoV-2 infectionCharacterization of an asymptomatic cohort of SARS-COV-2 infected individuals outside of Wuhan, ChinaHousehold transmission of SARS-CoV-2The assessment of transmission efficiency and latent infection period on asymptomatic carriers of SARS-CoV-2 infectionComparison of clinical and epidemiological characteristics of asymptomatic and symptomatic SARS-CoV-2 infection: A multi-center study in Sichuan Province, China.A study on infectivity of asymptomatic SARS-CoV-2 carriers.
title_abstract_phrases: Profiling pre-symptomatic and asymptomatic cases with confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection in Mexico CityIMPORTANCE: Asymptomatic SARS-CoV-2 infections are potential sources for transmission; characterization of these cases has not been conducted in most low/middle income countries, including Mexico.Characteristics of asymptomatic patients with SARS-CoV-2 infection in Jinan, ChinaCoronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2(SARS-CoV-2) is continuously and rapidly circulating at present.METHODS A total of 511 confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection cases, including 100 asymptomatic (by the time of the pathogenic tests) and 411 symptomatic individuals were consecutively enrolled from January 25 to February 20, 2020 from hospitals in 21 cities and 47 counties or districts in Sichuan Province.Conclusions: Asymptomatic SARS-CoV-2 infection is common and can be detected by analysis of saliva or NTS.CONCLUSIONS: Asymptomatic SARS-CoV-2 infection is common and can be detected by analysis of saliva or NTS.
